THE PROJECT AIMS TO EMPLOY A ONE HEALTH SEROLOGICAL AND GENOMIC SURVEILLANCE APPROACH INCORPORATING SPATIAL, GENETIC, AND DEMOGRAPHIC ANALYSES DERIVED FROM GENOMIC STRAIN DATA AND ASSOCIATED METADATA TO AID IN DETECTING AND TRACKING THE PREVALENCE OF BRUCELLOSIS IN HUMANS AND LIVESTOCK. THE RESULTS OF THIS PROJECT WILL ENHANCE SURVEILLANCE, DIAGNOSIS, AND IDENTIFICATION ACROSS THE PUBLIC AND VETERINARY HEALTH SECTORS IN IRAQ.
